data.name: addVectorItem
data.description: Adds a new vector item to the vector database. This method processes and stores items in the vector database for similarity search and retrieval operations.
data.short_description: Adds a new vector item to the vector database. This method processes and stores items in the vector database for similarity search and retrieval operations.

examples.title: Basic vector item addition

item.description: The item to add to the vector database.

data.raw_content:
---
name: addVectorItem
cbbaseinfo:
  description: Adds a new vector item to the vector database.
cbparameters:
  parameters:
    - name: item
      typeName: any
      description: The item to add to the vector.
  returns:
    signatureTypeName: Promise<AddVectorItemResponse>
    description: A promise that resolves when the item is successfully added.
data:
  name: addVectorItem
  category: vectordb
